about_the_game:
Freak Show: Party Royale is an insane and brutal local multiplayer party game for 1-6 players. Compete in a large collection of deadly mini games until there is only one Freak Show Champion left standing!

PUNISHMENT MODE

In this mode the game will hand out custom punishments after each round based on player performance. Want the loser to have to eat a habanero, drink something nasty or send an embarrasing text? The built in punishment editor lets you add any punishments you want. You can of course save and load different sets of punishments for future use as well.

GAMEPAD + KEYBOARD SUPPORT

The game supports up to 4 gamepads and two players on the same keyboard which makes it possible to play 6 players at the same time. So gone are the days where 4 players is the max limit!

EASY TO PICK UP AND PLAY

Tired of having to explain the rules and controls to new players? Then relax! This game is build from the ground up to be easy for anyone to pick up and play. There is also a practice option before each mini game to make sure every players knows what to do.

STEAM REMOTE PLAY

As all party games, this is best experienced by a group of friends in the same room IRL. Making it possible to punch that one player that is just way too cocky. But steam remote play is available for those who have no other option than to play online.
